Package chesspiece

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
chesspiece.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hourglass, Plus, Point, Sun, Time
public abstract class Piece extends Object
The abstract class of Piece; Represents a chess piece in a game. Every Piece object has a x, y coordinate, a PieceType, and a flipped boolean to represent the orientation of the Piece.

    Class

    static enum 
    Piece.PieceType
    The PieceType Enum; Represents a piece type of a Piece.

    • isMovableTo

      public abstract boolean isMovableTo(ChessBoard board, int x, int y)
      Validates a Piece movement to the specified x, y coordinates. Returns true if the Piece is movable to the specified x, y coordinates. This method is to be overwritten and implemented by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      board - the ChessBoard object
      x - the x coordinate to move to
      y - the y coordinate to move to
      Returns:
      true if the Piece is movable to the specified x, y coordinates
